net.proteusframework.core.metric

Class PixelMetric

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.metric.Metric
      • net.proteusframework.core.metric.PixelMetric
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public final class PixelMetric
extends Metric
    A PixelMetric instance defines the value of the Metric as a number of pixels.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
